p.k: 80% Mercenary Leonardo DiCaprio helps Djimon Hounsou find his stolen son in exchange for a rare jewel, in war-torn Sierra Leone. Thriller
66% Doting father Steve Martin struggles to let his little girl go when she announces that she is engaged to be married. Comedy remake starring Diane Keaton and Martin Short
79% Stanley Kubrick's Oscar-winning epic stars the late Kirk Douglas as the heroic slave who leads a rebellion against the Romans
64% Madonna gives a career-best performance as Argentina's controversial Eva Peron. Antonio Banderas co-stars in an Oscar-winning adaptation of Andrew Lloyd Webber's musical
65% Helen Hunt and the late Bill Paxton star in this FX-filled action movie about rival teams of scientists competing to investigate a series of destructive tornadoes
60% Two unlikely brothers reunite after years apart to seek out their long-lost mother. Comedy with Danny DeVito
81% Jim Carrey is an ordinary guy in an ordinary town. He's also the unsuspecting star of the world's longest-running reality TV show. Intelligent drama
79% Al Pacino stars as the ex-con trying to go straight but unable to escape his violent past. Thriller with Sean Penn
